long:
You can give exclusive permissions to users with this command. You can check your level with `/permission`.

*ADD/CHANGE*
`/permission add super @Thomas2500`
Adds a user to a given group.
*REMOVE*
`/permission remove @Thomas2500`
Removes the user permission.

*GROUPS*
`ADMIN_NOTHING` `->` Every normal user without permission.
`ADMIN_CHAT` `->` Per chat admin.
`ADMIN_GLOBAL` `->` Admin for all chats.
`ADMIN_SUPER` `->` The admin of all admins
